Interface AttachableElement<E extends HTMLElement>

All Superinterfaces:
Attachable, IsElement<E>
public interface AttachableElement<E extends HTMLElement> extends Attachable, IsElement<E>
Union interface that combines Attachable and IsElement and makes the registration simpler and more meaningful.
